meanings.definition: A small ornament worn on a necklace or bracelet.
meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed her new philtring on her silver necklace.
meanings.sent2: The shiny philtring added a touch of elegance to her bracelet.
meanings.sent3: The philtring on her necklace jingled softly as she walked, like a tiny bell.
meanings.sent4: Her philtring was like a sparkling gem, catching the light with every movement.
meanings.sent5: The delicate philtring was her favorite piece of jewelry, always drawing compliments.

meanings.sent1: She carefully philtringed her bracelet with the new charm.
meanings.sent2: He philtringed his hat with a feather for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: The artist philtringed the painting with a hidden symbol, adding a mysterious touch.
meanings.sent4: Her words were philtringed with kindness, making them even more touching.
meanings.sent5: The garden was philtringed with colorful flowers, creating a beautiful scene.

meanings.sent1: The antique shop had a wide selection of unique philtrings.
meanings.sent2: She collected philtrings from around the world, each with its own story.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the shiny philtring, batting it around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with philtrings of all shapes and sizes, creating a whimsical atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The old book had a hidden compartment with a secret philtring inside.
